name: Aeterna: Into the Void (Early Access)
description:
~~~ Heavily In Development ~~~

Aeterna is an arcade action RPG where you must defeat monsters to delve deeper into the void

- Dive into the first layer of the void and fight the King Slime

- Gather and upload Insight in exchange for gold

- Purchase gear at the Blacksmith

- Change out your gear at your room located in the guild hall

- Deposit and Withdraw your gold at the Guild Bank so you don't lose it on your expeditions
